body: Vladimir Pribylovskiy reports [RUS] hi-jacking of Valeria Novodvorskaya's (Russian liberal politician and a former Soviet dissident) LiveJournal account [RUS]. "The Brigade of Hell," dispersed group of generally pro-Kremlin hackers, took the responsibility for the attack. For the time being Novodvorskaya's account has been suspended.
original_body: Vladimir Pribylovskiy reports [RUS] hi-jacking of Valeria Novodvorskaya's (Russian liberal politician and a former Soviet dissident) LiveJournal account [RUS]. "The Brigade of Hell," dispersed group of generally pro-Kremlin hackers, took the responsibility for the attack. For the time being Novodvorskaya's account has been suspended.
title: Russia: Valeria Novodvorskaya's Blog Hacked
